::Battera::

She looked at him and smiled.  She gave his hands a light 
squeese. "You really want to take me back to Cybertron with you?"
Her spark pounded in her chest and she found herself holding her 
breath.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     "I thought you would be ready to leave the Alliance. And with a 
free one way trip to Cybertron," He said, taking her hand. "It would 
be perfect.
>     "As to why he wants to know his past, well it could be that he 
installed a program to make sure he remembers who he was, or that he 
is a big history buff."
>  (The comment on what actullay happened is a joke, I just wanted to 
see how far I could bend the rules. For the sake of RPing just 
pretend he only said the history buff part.)
